new_items.title: Dashboard inventory snapshot by category
new_items.description: Enhance InventorySnapshotWidget to show inventory grouped by flower categories (Deps, Indoor, Outdoor, Smalls, Candy Ends) with price bracket breakdown
new_items.current_state: InventorySnapshotWidget.tsx exists but lacks category grouping
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays inventory counts grouped by category
Categories include: Deps, Indoor, Outdoor, Smalls, Candy Ends
Each category shows price bracket breakdown ($100-200, $200-300, $300-400)
Counts update in real-time with inventory changes
new_items.evidence: And it'd be cool to see like depths, indoor, out, smalls, um, candy ends in various price brackets

new_items.title: Dashboard payables summary
new_items.description: Display payables due and scheduled payments on dashboard
new_items.current_state: TotalDebtWidget exists - verify if covers vendor payables
acceptance_criteria: Displays total amount owed to vendors
Links to full AR/AP for details
new_items.evidence: On dashboard, on dashboard, I go to dashboard and I can see payables, due payables, scheduled

new_items.title: Cash on hand display
new_items.description: Display current cash balance on dashboard
new_items.evidence: And then, you know, like how much money's on hand

new_items.title: Debt warning system for at-risk clients
new_items.description: Automated alert system that warns when client debt is going bad and recommends stopping credit extension
acceptance_criteria: Triggers alert when debt exceeds threshold (configurable)
new_items.evidence: you said you were gonna have some kind of tool that would like warn us when clients debts are going bad and to stop loaning the money kind of thing
new_items.suggested_approach: Add to Client360 or Leaderboard with debt aging calculation
open_questions: What threshold triggers warning? Days overdue or percentage of credit limit?

new_items.title: Store client login names
new_items.description: Add field to store client's Metrc/system login names
new_items.current_state: No existing field found in client schema
acceptance_criteria: Client profile has field for login name

new_items.title: Add metric explanations to leaderboard
new_items.description: Add tooltips/help text explaining what each leaderboard metric measures
new_items.current_state: METRIC_CATEGORIES has brief descriptions but may need more detail
acceptance_criteria: Each metric column has info icon
new_items.evidence: We'll need a little explanation on these

new_items.title: Consider consolidating metrics
new_items.description: Review and potentially combine related leaderboard metrics to reduce complexity
new_items.current_state: Multiple separate metrics may be overwhelming
acceptance_criteria: Maintain detail access for power users
new_items.evidence: maybe we can just combine them into, into less things

new_items.title: Payment permission levels
new_items.description: Receiving payments from clients should require elevated permissions vs paying vendors
new_items.current_state: WS-001-SPEC mentions RBAC but may not be fully implemented
acceptance_criteria: Role-based access control for payment functions
Accounting role can 'Pay Vendor' but not 'Receive Payment'
new_items.evidence: she only needs like low risk farmers. I feel like receiving payments is a little bit higher risk

new_items.title: Set Inventory as default landing page
new_items.description: User preference to set default page on login
new_items.current_state: DashboardPreferencesContext exists but may not include landing page preference
acceptance_criteria: User preference for default landing page
new_items.evidence: It doesn't really matter what I probably inventory would be where I'd like it to pop up

new_items.title: Simplify price category filtering
new_items.description: Current price category system has too many options, needs simplified brackets
new_items.current_state: Current system has many granular price categories
new_items.evidence: it's a little complicated because there's so many price categories

decisions.title: Calendar integration deprioritized
decisions.decision: Customer explicitly stated calendar integration is not needed for MVP
decisions.rationale: Prefers phone calendar for mobile convenience
decisions.evidence: I think it's just mostly, I think that's a later version thing

decisions.title: Dashboard requirements most important
decisions.decision: Customer confirmed dashboard configuration is top priority
decisions.evidence: my question about the dashboards and what we just talked about was probably the most important one

business_rules.title: Client creation is infrequent
business_rules.rule: Customer creates approximately 4 new clients per year
business_rules.implication: Client creation UX is low priority vs daily workflows

business_rules.title: One-time visitors use existing client tab
business_rules.rule: For one-time visitors, use an existing 'walk-in' or generic client record
business_rules.implication: No need for anonymous order capability

open_questions.question: What threshold should trigger the debt warning system?
open_questions.context: Days overdue? Percentage of credit limit?

open_questions.question: What is the desired aging threshold for inventory alerts?
Should 'Receive Payment' be completely restricted or just require approval?
